summary: Radu the Beggar is a standalone mod that adds a new follower to your game-a breton named Radu.He cand be found at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
------------------------------- 
INTRODUCING - Radu! 
------------------------------- 
Radu is a beggar that lives in Whiterun.He can be found in the Bannered Mare losing all his money on drinks. 
------------------------------- 
Backstory: 
Radu was the emperor of the continent of Pulomania until there was an attempt of assassination by Juratu Lucian and his partner,Quiet.Radu's bodyguard,a dog,Sambo,jumped in front of the arrow meant to kill Radu.He traveled to Tamriel in order to find safety,and became a beggar.Now he is willing to accompany you on your adventures! 
------------------------------- 
About Radu:
Radu is a level 20 Breton,he isn't leveling up with the character.All skills are 15,except stealth,which is 30.
------------------------------- 
Requirements: 
NOTHING! 
------------------------------- 
Changelog: 
v1.2-Made minor changes
v1.1-Changed the appearance of Radu. 
v1.0-Radu added to the game. 
------------------------------- 
In upcoming updates: 
-Sambo,another potential follower 
-Making Radu to level up with the character
------------------------------- 
Credits: 
Bethesda-for creating the game and Creation Kit
-------------------------------
Links:
Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=550666669
author: Aquila
